item.title: Report E-2024080664
item.description:
Report E-2024080664

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-29T09:23:34+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-25
  • City: WICHITA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Clean Harbors was dispatched to the site. Upon the contractorâ€™s arrival, personnel observed that the released material impacted a 2ft-by-2ft area of the trailer floor and estimated that one (1) cup of material was released due to a leaking bung cap. Clean Harbors personnel neutralized the impacted area, replaced the degraded bung cap, and then cleaned the released material. The degraded bung cap and recovered material were placed into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum and was staged onsite at the terminal prior to the contractor demobilization
